experiences.title: Marketing Manager
experiences.description:
Headed new product development and packaging design on the Dove Dream Project (Hindustan Unilever).
Designed and implemented a customer onboarding and service journey framework, improving operational efficiency and achieving a 90% customer satisfaction score.
Drove market expansion by leading high impact campaigns and showcasing at top exhibitions like Cosmoprof Mumbai and CMPL Delhi.

experiences.title: MIS and Operations Executive
experiences.description:
Drove profitability by analyzing daily work center performance and implementing reward and recognition strategies.
Spearheaded automation initiatives, collaborated with Odoo to develop and implement a tailored ERP solution.
Led cultural transformation for a team of 350 blue-collar employees.

experiences.title: Assurance Associate
experiences.description:
Prepared high quality audit and assurance workpapers in alignment with EY Global methodology for US SEC Clients.
Served as the primary point of contact from EY India, liaising with global teams through calls and meetings to share updates, insights, and feedback.
Awarded the Social Impact Champion Award at EY for demonstrating exceptional proactivity.
